action.text: Referred to the Committee on the Judiciary.

bill.summary:
Designates the week of July 17-July 21, 2017, as National Ectodermal Dysplasias Week. (Ectodermal dysplasias are a group of genetic conditions that commonly affect the hair, nails, teeth, and sweat glands.)
Encourages Americans to become more informed about ectodermal dysplasias and the role of treatment in improving quality of life.
